list_definition.definition: a man or boy admired (by many people) for his brave deeds

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The boy was regarded as a hero for saving his friend’s life.

list_definition.definition: the chief male person in a story, play etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The hero of this book is a young American boy called Tom Sawyer.

list_ex_of_english: In common with other boy heroes of melodrama, he performs heroic deeds.
